body:
<!-- Thanks for taking the time to report this build failure. To proceed with the report please:

1. Title the issue "Installation issue: <name-of-the-package>".
2. Provide the information required below.

We encourage you to try, as much as possible, to reduce your problem to the minimal example that still reproduces the issue. That would help us a lot in fixing it quickly and effectively! -->

xz package cannot be downloaded from sourceforge.net

I can download the files through the browser, despite the fact that it takes ages to start the download.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install xz
==> Fetching https://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/lzmautils/files/xz-5.2.5.tar.bz2
################################################################################################# 100.0%################################################################################################# 100.0%curl: (28) Operation timed out after 10001 milliseconds with 0 out of 0 bytes received                 

==> Failed to fetch file from URL: https://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/lzmautils/files/xz-5.2.5.tar.bz2
    Curl failed with error 28
==> Fetching https://freefr.dl.sourceforge.net/lzmautils/files/xz-5.2.5.tar.bz2
################################################################################################# 100.0%curl: (28) Failed to connect to iweb.dl.sourceforge.net port 443: Connection timed out                 

==> Failed to fetch file from URL: https://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/lzmautils/files/xz-5.2.5.tar.bz2
    Curl failed with error 28
==> Fetching https://netcologne.dl.sourceforge.net/lzmautils/files/xz-5.2.5.tar.bz2
################################################################################################# 100.0%################################################################################################# 100.0%curl: (28) Operation timed out after 10001 milliseconds with 0 out of 0 bytes received                 

==> Failed to fetch file from URL: https://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/lzmautils/files/xz-5.2.5.tar.bz2
    Curl failed with error 28
==> Fetching https://pilotfiber.dl.sourceforge.net/lzmautils/files/xz-5.2.5.tar.bz2
################################################################################################# 100.0%curl: (28) Operation timed out after 10000 milliseconds with 0 out of 0 bytes received                 

==> Failed to fetch file from URL: https://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/lzmautils/files/xz-5.2.5.tar.bz2
    Curl failed with error 28
==> Fetching https://downloads.sourceforge.net/lzmautils/files/xz-5.2.5.tar.bz2
################################################################################################# 100.0%curl: (28) Operation timed out after 10001 milliseconds with 0 out of 0 bytes received                 

==> Failed to fetch file from URL: https://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/lzmautils/files/xz-5.2.5.tar.bz2
    Curl failed with error 28
==> Fetching http://kent.dl.sourceforge.net/sourceforge/lzmautils/files/xz-5.2.5.tar.bz2
################################################################################################# 100.0%curl: (28) Failed to connect to iweb.dl.sourceforge.net port 443: Connection timed out                 

==> Failed to fetch file from URL: https://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/lzmautils/files/xz-5.2.5.tar.bz2
    Curl failed with error 28
==> Fetching from https://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/lzmautils/files/xz-5.2.5.tar.bz2 failed.
==> Fetching https://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/lzmautils/files/xz-5.2.5.tar.bz2
################################################################################################# 100.0%################################################################################################# 100.0%curl: (28) Operation timed out after 10001 milliseconds with 0 out of 0 bytes received                 

==> Failed to fetch file from URL: https://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/lzmautils/files/xz-5.2.5.tar.bz2
    Curl failed with error 28
==> Fetching from https://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/lzmautils/files/xz-5.2.5.tar.bz2 failed.
==> Error: FetchError: All fetchers failed for spack-stage-xz-5.2.5-pixet4f7srjq65ejmwr7meuuluej3rhg

...
```

### Information on your system

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->
* **Spack:** 0.14.2-1284-de63e1c2a
* **Python:** 3.8.3
* **Platform:** linux-archrolling-westmere

and the same in a server in different location: 

* **Spack:** 0.14.2-1284-de63e1c
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-centos7-skylake_avx512

<!-- If you have any relevant configuration detail (custom `packages.yaml` or `modules.yaml`, etc.) you can add that here as well. -->

### Additional information

<!-- Please upload the following files. They should be present in the stage directory of the failing build. Also upload any config.log or similar file if one exists. -->

Not generated

* [spack-build-out.txt]()
* [spack-build-env.txt]()

<!-- Some packages have maintainers who have volunteered to debug build failures. Run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mention them here if they exist. -->

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [ ] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: xz
